Table Themes

Source: vignettes/table_themes.Rmd
table_themes.Rmd

gtUtils v0.1 ships with eight table themes.

gt_theme_athletic
gt_theme_gtutils
gt_theme_kenpom
gt_theme_ncaa
gt_theme_pl
gt_theme_savant
gt_theme_sofa – light mode
gt_theme_sofa – dark mode
gt_theme_tier – light mode
gt_theme_tier – dark mode

Developed by Andrew Weatherman.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
